projects.title: sweetbeats
projects.alt: thumbnail of sweet beats React website
projects.summary: A playlist creator application that uses the Spotify Web API and OAuth 2.0 API. The app allows the user to creator playlists based on bpm, danceability, energy, instrumentalness, and valence (musical positiveness). Users can enjoy a 30 second preview of songs in each playlist and save them to the user's Spotify account for later enjoyment. Myself and three other developers created this application for a Chingu cohort group project during a six week span.

projects.title: moviefinder
projects.summary: This is an imdb clone application created by myself and a team of 3 other developers for a six week Chingu group project. It has been built with the React JavaScript framework. It features a search bar to look for a film, a sign up form to create a new account, and a sign in link that opens a modal to enter a username and password. Clicking on a movie card image takes the user to a page with more details about the selected movie. The plus sign adds the movie to a watchlist where it is stored in a firebase database and is displayed under the My Watchlist tab.
